    • Method Detail

      • checkPasswordRequirements

        public static boolean checkPasswordRequirements(java.lang.String password)
        Checks if the password introduced by a user attempting to register respects the requirements.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to be checked
        Returns:
        boolean the result of the password check (true = password meets requirements; false = password does not meet requirements)

      • login

        public static UserLoginStatus login(int userNumber,
                    java.lang.String username,
                    java.lang.String password)
        Logically logs in the user that has entered his/her credentials.
        Parameters:
        userNumber - integer used to identify which one of the two players to instantiate (i.e. left or right) username the username of the user attempting to log in password the password of the user attempting to log in
        Returns:
        UserLoginStatus represents the result of the login (success; wrong password; username not found; user already logged in)

      • logout

        public static void logout(User user)
        Logically logs out a user
        Parameters:
        user - the user that has clicked on the "Logout" button in the GUI

      • registerUser

        public static UserRegistrationStatus registerUser(java.lang.String username,
                                  java.lang.String password)
        Registers a user into the system
        Parameters:
        username - the username of choice password the password or the user
        Returns:
        UserRegistrationStatus represents the result of the register (success; username taken; password requirements not met; error in creating user)
